title: Hour 3 - Chris Simms (05-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Chris Simms (05-15-20)
description:
Chris Simms helps clear up a rumor for Dan that had Russell Wilson being on the trading block. Chris also tells Dan that he thinks the Steelers will be fined if what James Harrison said about Coach Mike Tomlin paying his fine was true.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
